Addressing Uncertainty in MultiSector Dynamics Research¶

Testing out mathjax¶

The first-order sensitivity index indicates the percent of model output variance contributed by a factor individually (i.e., the effect of varying xialone) and is obtained using the following (Saltelli, 2002a; Sobol, 2001):

\[S_i^1 = \frac{V_{x_i} [E_{x\sim_i} (x_i)]}{V(y)}\]

with E and V denoting the expected value and the variance, respectively.

Testing out a codeblock¶

1 import ebook
2
3 ebook.plot_experimental_design()
